title: React portfolio
description: A portfolio site built with React and Node.
process: It's this website - my first ever experience with React ^_^

title: Fin Focus
description: FinFocus is a trusted provider of financial news and services for individuals and businesses alike.
process: This is a student collaboration project. Aside from managing the project, I was in charge of the design and UI/UX, implemented all Javascript/Jquery functionality and assisted the team with HTML structure and Bootstrap styling. The website is built with JavaScript/jQuery and Bootstrap for page structure and features detailed and minimal responsive design. Utilising several APIs for financial news display, stock and crypto values.
features: Easy-to-navigate financial news website
Pages: main, about, contact and terms
Financial news rendered in several categories with featured articles
Add articles to favourites
Search NY times financial articles by keywords
Full list of top articles in the aside section
Sliders with stock and crypto data
Current date and weather display in the header
Sticky on-page navigation
Footer on-site global navigation
On scroll animations on the about and terms pages

title: Team profile generator
description: This CLI node.js application generates an HTML file that displays essential information about a software engineering team's employees, such as their emails and GitHub profiles. Team generator prompts the user with Inquirer to provide details about the employees.

img.alt: Preview of generated html from team profile generator.

title: README generator
description: A node CLI application that uses the inquirer to collect the project information and generates a neat README.md based on provided information.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Moody display of current weather and forecast. Access current weather data for any location on Earth. Beautiful on desktop, beautiful on mobile.
features: Current weather
5-day forecast
Search bar
History of searches accessible with a click of a button
Smooth transitions
Custom weather backgrounds for each weather type
Animated loader

title: Daily Planner
description: This app runs in the browser and features dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript/jQuery, Bootstrap and moment.js. Accessible, convenient, awesome. Tested in Chrome, Opera and Firefox.
features: Daily planner hour by hour
Hours selection option input for the planner, dynamically updated HTML based on input
UX: tasks are saved/deleted on a one-by-one basis, or all
Retain data utilizing local storage
Crisp like a freezing wind mobile-first responsive design

title: Code quiz
description: The quiz allows to test one's knowledge of JavaScript fundamentals with a timed multiple choice quiz. For every wrong answer user is penalised by losing 10 seconds of the remaining time. Upon completion (or time run out) user is able to save their score, so they can challenge themselves over and over, until they get all the answers right.
process: This app runs in the browser, and features dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript. As always, built with accessibility in mind. Tested in Chrome, Firefox and Opera.
features: Interactive timed quiz
Option for user to select amount of questions (10/15/20)
Randomised questions, each with 4 randomised answer options
Time penalty on incorrect answer
Get 2 points for the correct answer, lose 1 point for incorrect
Client-side scores saving and display of the top 10 scores
UI and sound effect feedback on correct/incorrect answer choice, variable ending sound based on the reason game ended - either all questions are answered or time runs out
Option to switch the sound off (preferences saved locally)
Clean, polished and responsive mobile-first design

title: Password Generator
description: Web application to generate random password based on user's configuration.
features: Generate a password with a click of a button
Customise what characters to include
Endless configuration for password length, character types(lowercase, uppercase, numeric and special characters), conveniently predefined for speedy password generation
In-built validation to avoid empty/undefined password generation
Convenient copy function with nice little animation feedback
Moody design

title: Portfolio 2022
description: A sinlge-page concept portfolio heavily utilizing Bootstrap framework.
features: Bootstrap-powered HTML structure containing sections: about, projects list, counter feature, testimonials and contact
Responsive navigation bar with on-scroll behaviour
A hero section featuring a video background
Fully Responsive layout
Animations: on scroll appearance, marquee, typing effect
Modal contact form + on-page section for accessibility
Auto-turn animations and moving elements off for users on devices with defined preferences
Accessible integration of FontAwesome

title: Portfolio 2021
description: Custom WordPress theme for personal site. Theme supports custom post types, taxonomies, custom in-built contact form. Posts, comments, pages and wordpress blocks style adapted to theme style.
